name: riotaeqbidv
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(crio(s0, c0, w1), crio(s0, c1, w2)))
bodyPretty: ⊢ (w0 → iota(s0 ∈ c0, w1)= iota(s0 ∈ c1, w2))

stmt.origin: eqtrd(crio(s0, c0, w1), crio(s0, c1, w2), crio(s0, c0, w2), w0)
stmt.pretty: eqtrd(iota(s0 ∈ c0, w1), iota(s0 ∈ c1, w2), iota(s0 ∈ c0, w2), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(crio(s0, c0, w1), crio(s0, c1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(crio(s0, c0, w1), crio(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(crio(s0, c0, w2), crio(s0, c1, w2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → iota(s0 ∈ c0, w1)= iota(s0 ∈ c1, w2))
⊣ (w0 → iota(s0 ∈ c0, w1)= iota(s0 ∈ c0, w2))
⊣ (w0 → iota(s0 ∈ c0, w2)= iota(s0 ∈ c1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(crio(s0, c0, w1), crio(s0, c1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(crio(s0, c0, w1), crio(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(crio(s0, c0, w2), crio(s0, c1, w2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → iota(s0 ∈ c0, w1)= iota(s0 ∈ c1, w2))
⊣ (w0 → iota(s0 ∈ c0, w1)= iota(s0 ∈ c0, w2))
⊣ (w0 → iota(s0 ∈ c0, w2)= iota(s0 ∈ c1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(crio(s0, c0, w1), crio(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(crio(s0, c0, w1), crio(s0, c1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(crio(s0, c0, w2), crio(s0, c1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(crio(s0, c0, w2), crio(s0, c1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(crio(s0, c0, w1), crio(s0, c1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))

comment: Equality deduction for restricted universal quantifier. (Contributed by NM, 15-Sep-2011.)
